featured.text: Forced to quit school in fifth grade after his father died, Abate worked as a shoe-shine boy for years.
Anything from getting a bad grade on a test to losing an important game can make you feel sad.
Extra virgin oil, the finest grade, is made from the first pressing of the olives and has a very low acidity rate (under 1%).

other.text: At the beginning of the semester, the teacher told the students that late assignments would receive a low grade as a _____.
In one study, nearly 600 children from kindergarten to sixth grade took part in a nutrition curriculum intended to get them to eat more vegetables and whole grains.

definition.en_def: A level of quality, size, or importance; a score given to a student's work.
definition.example: She received a high grade on her math exam.
